**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
In my code we have used a local function pandas_udf inside method of a class. But when we package this code, i am
getting picking error. 
_pickle.PicklingError: Can't pickle <cyfunction Overfit.get_dummies.<locals>.overfit at 0x000002DF651BC528>: it's not found as tools.estimation.Overfit.Overfit.get_dummies.<locals>.overfit
 [...]
```cython
# add use case related code here
    def get_dummies(self, df_sales: pd.DataFrame) -> DataFrame:

        schema_str = StructType([
            StructField(store_col_copy, DoubleType(), True),
            StructField(yrmo_col_copy, DoubleType(), True),
            StructField(sku_col_copy, DoubleType(), True),
            StructField('utilities', DoubleType(), True)])

        @pandas_udf(schema_str, PandasUDFType.GROUPED_MAP)
        def overfit(df_sales_sample):
            store = df_sales_sample[store_col_copy].iloc[0]
            yrmo = df_sales_sample[yrmo_col_copy].iloc[0]

            overfit_util = pd.Series({u: dummies[i] for (i, u) in enumerate(skus_sample)}).to_frame().reset_index()
            overfit_util.columns = [sku_col_copy, 'overfit_utilities']
            overfit_util[store_col_copy] = store
            overfit_util[yrmo_col_copy] = yrmo
            return overfit_util.drop_duplicates()

        df_sales_spark = self._spark.createDataFrame(df_sales)
        overfit_spark = df_sales_spark.groupby([store_col_copy, yrmo_col_copy]).apply(overfit)
        return overfit_spark
```

comment_data.body:
I don't think this is specifically a Cython issue - if you try to pickle a Python nested function then it'll also fail.

With that said it might be possible for Cython to do better here provided that all the captured variables are pickleable.

title: The Local function are not recognized when packaged with cython code.
